govhr

The goal of govhr is to provide a set of open-source tools that:

  1. Standardize and efficiently clean human resource management information system (HRMIS) data.
  2. Produce analytical insights in a standard, but customizable, format.
  3. Quality assures both 1 and 2.

govhr is based on the Public Sector Employment and Compensation Assessment Framework developed by the World Bank.

Installation

You can install the development version of govhr from GitHub with:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("WB-PIDA-Data-Science-Shop/govhr")

Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

library(govhr)
## basic example code
